entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Melita
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:32 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -29.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Melita 10:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: -29.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -37
Dewpoint: -32.2°C
Wind: NNW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 32 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023
